pages.title: Stellum
pages.text: A fragment of a living star, the raw energy contained within this material is surpassed only by few, every molecule of it vibrating with $(thing)Stellar Energy$().

pages.title: Obtaining Stellum
pages.text: $(item)Stellum Ore$() can be found inside $(thing)$(l:world/asteroids)Asteroids$() in $(thing)Space$().$(p)Mining requires an $(item)Asterite Pickaxe$() (Mining Level 5) or better, usually resulting in a single $(item)$(l:world/ore_clusters)Stellum Cluster$() which can be forged into a $(item)Stellum Ingot$().

pages.title: Usages
pages.text: Stellum can be used to create powerful tooling roughly equivalent to $(thing)$(l:resources/asterite)Asterite$(). Born from the heart of a living star, it is fire proof to an extent never seen before; and posses a power that, when harnessed, can power an entire civilization.
